name: Tecnometry
description:
Tecnometry is a simply Bullet Hell like game made for the BulletHellJam of 2022, where you have to protect yourself of incoming enemies by drawing your projectiles whit your mouse.

Your final score will be based on the time you have survived and the enemies you have killed. The three best players will be shown at the main menu. Try to be the best!

Shoutout to some assets that were used:

  • Bullet Hell Mini Music Pack by SVL (https://svl.itch.io/bullet-hell-music-pack)
  • SPACE vy VectorPixelStar (https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/space)
  • Interface SFX Pack 1 by ObsidianX (https://obsydianx.itch.io/interface-sfx-pack-1)
  • 300+ Futuristic SFX by GameSupplyGuy (https://gamesupply.itch.io/300-futuristic-sfx-with-names)
